mapper.select: SELECT R1.*, LIKE_COUNT FROM TBL_REPLY R1 JOIN( SELECT ID, LIKE_COUNT FROM ( SELECT R.ID, COUNT(R.ID) LIKE_COUNT FROM TBL_REPLY R LEFT JOIN TBL_FREE_POST_REPLY_LIKE FRL ON R.ID = FRL.REPLY_ID LEFT JOIN TBL_CONSULTING_POST_REPLY_LIKE CRL ON R.ID = CRL.REPLY_ID GROUP BY R.ID ORDER BY LIKE_COUNT DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1 )R2 ON R1.ID = R2.ID

SELECT ID, POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, CATEGORY FROM ( SELECT ID, POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, CATEGORY FROM TBL_POST ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE() ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
